data.name: kstidFileCategory
data.comment: This is the file category for toolbar/menu items. This string is used in the dialog that allows users to customize their toolbars.

data.name: kstidEditCategory
data.comment: This is the edit category for toolbar/menu items. This string is used in the dialog that allows users to customize their toolbars.

data.name: kstidFormatCategory
data.comment: This is the format category for toolbar/menu items. This string is used in the dialog that allows users to customize their toolbars.

data.name: kstidViewCategory
data.comment: This is the view category for toolbar/menu items. This string is used in the dialog that allows users to customize their toolbars.

data.name: kstidToolsCategory
data.comment: This is the tools category for toolbar/menu items. This string is used in the dialog that allows users to customize their toolbars.

data.name: kstidWindowCategory
data.comment: This is the window category for toolbar/menu items. This string is used in the dialog that allows users to customize their toolbars.

data.name: kstidHelpCategory
data.comment: This is the help category for toolbar/menu items. This string is used in the dialog that allows users to customize their toolbars.

data.name: kstidDefaultStatusBarMsg
data.comment: This is the message displayed in a main window's status bar when there is no other meaningful message to display.

data.name: kstidNewMsg
data.comment: This is the status bar message for the new language project menu option.

data.name: kstidOpenMsg
data.comment: This is the status bar message for the open menu option.

data.name: kstidCloseMsg
data.comment: This is the status bar message for the close menu option.

data.name: kstidSaveMsg
data.comment: This is the status bar message for the save menu option.

data.name: kstidProjectPropertiesMsg
data.value: Modify properties of a FieldWorks project.
data.comment: This is the status bar message for the Fieldworks project properties menu option.

data.name: kstidBackupRestoreMsg
data.value: Backup or restore a FieldWorks project.
data.comment: This is the status bar message for the backup and restore menu option.

data.name: kstidRenameMsg
data.comment: This is the status bar message for the rename project menu option.

data.name: kstidDeleteProjMsg
data.comment: This is the status bar message for the delete project menu option.

data.name: kstidPageSetupMsg
data.comment: This is the status bar message for the page setup menu option.

data.name: kstidPrintMsg
data.comment: This is the status bar message for the print menu option.

data.name: kstidExitMsg
data.comment: This is the status bar message for the exit menu option.

data.name: kstidUndoMsg
data.comment: This is the status bar message for the undo menu option.

data.name: kstidRedoMsg
data.value: Redo the most recent undone change.
data.comment: This is the status bar message for the redo menu option.

data.name: kstidCutMsg
data.value: Cut text and put it on the clipboard.
data.comment: This is the status bar message for the cut menu option.

data.name: kstidCopyMsg
data.comment: This is the status bar message for the copy menu option.

data.name: kstidPasteMsg
data.comment: This is the status bar message for the paste menu option.

data.name: kstidSelectAllMsg
data.comment: This is the status bar message for the select all menu option.

data.name: kstidFindMsg
data.comment: This is the status bar message for the find menu option.

data.name: kstidFindNextMsg
data.comment: This is the status bar message for the find next menu option.

data.name: kstidFindPrevMsg
data.comment: This is the status bar message for the find previous menu option.

data.name: kstidReplaceMsg
data.comment: This is the status bar message for the find and replace menu option.

data.name: kstidDeleteMsg
data.comment: This is the status bar message for the delete selection menu option.

data.name: kstidStatusBarMsg
data.value: Show or hide the Status bar.
data.comment: This is the status bar message for the view status bar menu option.

data.name: kstidSideBarMsg
data.value: Show or hide the Side bar.
data.comment: This is the status bar message for the view side bar menu option.

data.name: kstidStyleMsg
data.value: Open a dialog to add, delete, or change styles.
data.comment: This is the status bar message for the styles menu option.

data.name: kstidRemoveCharStyleMsg
data.value: Remove the character style formatting from the current selection.
data.comment: This is the status bar message for the remove character style formatting menu option.

data.name: kstidRemoveParaStyleMsg
data.value: Reset the style of the current paragraph to the default paragraph style.
data.comment: This is the status bar message for the reset paragraph style formatting menu option.

data.name: kstidUserPropertiesMsg
data.comment: This is the status bar message for the user properties menu option.

data.name: kstidNewWindowMsg
data.value: Opens another identical second window containing the same data.
data.comment: This is the status bar message for the new window menu option.

data.name: kstidCascadeMsg
data.value: Arranges open windows to be cascade from top left to bottom right.
data.comment: This is the status bar message for the window cascade menu option.

data.name: kstidTileMsg
data.value: Arranges open windows to be equal heights, displayed one on top of the other
data.comment: This is the status bar message for the tile, stacked menu option.

data.name: kstidTileSideBySideMsg
data.value: Arranges open windows to be of equal widths, displayed side-by-side
data.comment: This is the status bar message for the tile, side-by-side menu option.

data.name: kstidWindowListItemFormatter
data.comment: This is the format for the window list in the window menu {0} is info bar text and {1} is the project name.

data.name: kstidAddToDict
data.comment: Text for adding word to dictionary on the context menu.

data.name: kstidAddToDictToolTip
data.comment: Tool tip for adding word to dictionary.

data.name: kstidChangeMultiOccurrences
data.comment: Text for changing multiple occurrences of a word on the context menu.

data.name: kstidChangeMultiOccurrencesToolTip
data.comment: Tool tip for changing multiple occurrences of a word.
